statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryTracking;
SELECT item_name, current_quantity FROM InventoryTracking ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_quantity FROM InventoryTracking WHERE current_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM InventoryTracking ORDER BY current_quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, current_quantity, reorder_level FROM InventoryTracking WHERE reorder_level < 10 ORDER BY reorder_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryTracking WHERE current_quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, current_quantity FROM InventoryTracking WHERE reorder_level < 50 ORDER BY current_quantity ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_quantity, reorder_level FROM InventoryTracking ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT item_name, current_quantity, reorder_level FROM InventoryTracking WHERE current_quantity < 50 OR reorder_level < 10 ORDER BY reorder_level DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_quantity, reorder_level FROM InventoryTracking WHERE item_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_id, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE reorder_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM reorder_processes ORDER BY reorder_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(order_quantity) AS total_order FROM reorder_processes GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < reorder_level ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT product_id, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE reorder_level < 50 ORDER BY current_quantity DESC
SELECT AVG(current_quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_id, SUM(current_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT r.process_id, r.order_quantity, rp.reorder_date FROM reorder_processes r JOIN inventory_levels rp ON r.product_id = rp.product_id
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < 10
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered > 20
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE item_id = 3
SELECT item_name, quantity, reorder_threshold FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < reorder_threshold;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT orders.order_id, inventory_items.item_name, orders.quantity_ordered FROM orders JOIN inventory_items ON orders.item_id = inventory_items.item_id WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT item_id, SUM(quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM orders GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_ordered > 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers;
SELECT product_id, MAX(quantity_ordered) AS max_ordered FROM Orders GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM ReorderLogs WHERE reorder_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT Orders.order_id, Inventory.product_name, Orders.quantity_ordered FROM Orders INNER JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE Orders.order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%a%' OR supplier_name LIKE '%e%'

SELECT Suppliers.supplier_name, COUNT(Orders.order_id) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers LEFT JOIN Orders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Orders.product_id GROUP BY Suppliers.supplier_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC

SELECT Inventory.product_name, ReorderLogs.reorder_date, ReorderLogs.quantity_to_order FROM Inventory JOIN ReorderLogs ON Inventory.product_id = ReorderLogs.product_id WHERE ReorderLogs.reorder_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_quantity < 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT order_id, item_id, supplier_id, SUM(order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY order_id, item_id, supplier_id HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT t.transaction_id, o.order_id, t.transaction_type, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN orders o ON t.order_id = o.order_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'payment'
SELECT rh.order_id, rh.reorder_date, rh.reorder_quantity, i.item_name FROM reordering_history rh JOIN inventory_items i ON rh.order_id = i.item_id WHERE rh.reorder_quantity >= 20
